User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the VApps Success Hub platform.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

role.description: The global role of the user on the platform. 'superadmin' has all rights. 'membre' is a standard user. 'prospect' is a potential user.

dateJoined.description: The date and time the user joined the platform.

origin.description: Source of user creation (e.g., 'Footer Contact Form').

status.description: Status for a prospect (e.g., new, contacted).

message.description: The message sent by the prospect from the contact form.

lastSignInTime.description: The last time the user signed in, synced from Firebase Auth.

gdprReportedAt.description: Timestamp for when an admin reports an inactivity alert for this user.

Membership.title: Membership
Membership.description: Represents the relationship between a user and an agency, including their role.

role.description: The role of the user within this specific agency.

counselorId.description: The ID of the user's assigned counselor within this agency.

counselorName.description: The name of the user's assigned counselor.

Agency.title: Agency
Agency.description: Represents an agency on the platform, containing all personalization settings.

personalization.description: All personalization settings for the agency.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents a scheduled appointment between a coach and a client.

coachId.description: Reference to User representing the coach. (Relationship: User 1:N Appointment)

clientId.description: Reference to User representing the client. (Relationship: User 1:N Appointment)

startTime.description: The start date and time of the appointment.

endTime.description: The end date and time of the appointment.

status.description: The status of the appointment (e.g., scheduled, completed, cancelled).

id.description: Unique identifier for the email campaign.

name.description: The name of the email campaign.

subject.description: The subject line of the email campaign.

body.description: The HTML or plain text body of the email campaign.

segment.description: User segment targeted by the email campaign (e.g., new sign-ups, inactive users).

scheduledTime.description: The date and time the email campaign is scheduled to be sent.

status.description: The status of the email campaign (e.g., draft, scheduled, sent, completed).

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message sent between users on the platform.

senderId.description: Reference to User who sent the message. (Relationship: User 1:N Message)

recipientId.description: Reference to User who received the message. (Relationship: User 1:N Message)

timestamp.description: The date and time the message was sent.

isRead.description: Indicates whether the recipient has read the message.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents an invoice for coaching sessions or other services, generated from an accepted quote.

clientInfo.description: A snapshot of the client's information.

quoteNumber.description: The number of the original quote.

Quote.title: Quote
Quote.description: Represents a quote or estimate for services.

validationCode.description: A secret code for the client to validate the quote.

clientInfo.description: A snapshot of the client's information at the time of quote creation.

agencyInfo.description: A snapshot of the agency's information.

contractId.description: ID of the attached contract template.

contractContent.description: Snapshot of the contract HTML content.

signature.description: The name entered by the client as a signature.

signedDate.description: Timestamp of when the quote was signed.

Contract.title: Contract
Contract.description: Represents a contract template for an agency.

agencyId.description: The ID of the agency this contract belongs to.

title.description: The title of the contract template.

content.description: The HTML content of the contract.

Consent.title: Consent
Consent.description: Represents a user's consent to data processing, in line with GDPR.

id.description: Unique identifier for the consent record.

userId.description: Reference to User who provided consent. (Relationship: User 1:N Consent)

consentType.description: The type of consent (e.g., marketing emails, data sharing).

consentGiven.description: Indicates whether the user has given consent.

timestamp.description: The date and time the consent was given or withdrawn.

LandingPage.title: LandingPage
LandingPage.description: Represents the configuration and content of the landing page.

id.description: Unique identifier for the landing page configuration.

title.description: The title of the landing page.

content.description: The content of the landing page, stored as HTML or JSON.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time the landing page was last updated.

status.description: The status of the landing page (e.g., draft, published).

Plan.title: Plan
Plan.description: Represents a pricing plan for the agency.

description.description: A short description of the plan.

features.description: A list of features included in the plan.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image associated with the plan.

appointmentCredits.description: Number of appointment credits included in the plan.

isFeatured.description: Whether the plan should be highlighted as 'featured'.

isPublic.description: Whether the plan should be displayed on the public pricing page.

agencyId.description: The ID of the agency this plan belongs to.

GdprRequest.title: GDPR Request
GdprRequest.description: Represents a user request related to their personal data.

SupportRequest.title: Support Request
SupportRequest.description: Represents a technical support request for the application.

FaqItem.title: FAQ Item
FaqItem.description: Represents a single question and answer item in a FAQ.

category.description: The category or theme of the question.

content.description: The answer content in HTML format.

pdfUrls.description: List of URLs to associated PDF documents.

scope.description: Defines if the FAQ is for the whole platform or a specific agency.

agencyId.description: The ID of the agency this FAQ item belongs to, if scope is 'agency'.

params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is updated to support a true multi-agency model. The `agencyId` field is removed from the `User` entity. A new top-level `memberships` collection is introduced to create a many-to-many relationship between users and agencies. Each document in `memberships` links a `userId` to an `agencyId` and specifies the user's `role` within that agency. This allows a single user account to belong to multiple agencies with different roles. Security rules will be updated to check for the existence and role within these membership documents, rather than relying on a field on the user document.
